subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko beat Lamon Brewster with a technical knockout after six rounds yesterday in Cologne, Germany, to successfully defend his International Boxing Federation and International Boxing Organization heavyweight titles.Brewster was the last man to defeat Klitschko (49-3). In 2004, Brewster beat Klitschko with a fifth-round technical knockout to win the vacant World Boxing Organization championship.
